text: Many of us get flu shots every year. 💉 That's because the flu virus is always changing. 🦠 So, will we need a yearly #coronavirus #vaccine as well? Experts say probably not. But the #COVID19 virus IS mutating. How will that affect #vaccines? FULL STORY —> https://t.co/DZ45UvYt6a https://t.co/rohxgs45xj
